title: I live in Canada and I only heard about Quakerism a few days ago. Why did I never heard of this religion before even if it is part of the Christian family? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s dozens of small Christian sects, I can’t blame you for not knowing of all of them. I sure don’t. Most people only know of Quakers (Society of Friends) because of the guy on the oatmeal box.
